company.name: Total Quality Lending
company.headquarters: 630 W Carmel Dr, Suite 160, Carmel, IN 46032
company.closingTimeline: Industry-leading 7-day turnaround from submission to closing
company.mission: Inspiring and equipping everyday Americans to build wealth in order to live life on purpose.

products.name: DSCR Loans
products.description: Debt Service Coverage Ratio investment property financing for real estate investors and agents. Qualify based on property cash flow rather than personal income.
products.propertyTypes: 1-4 unit residential, 5-8 unit, 2-8 unit mixed-use properties
keyFeatures: Qualification based on property rental income vs. debt payments
Available for 1-8 unit residential and mixed-use properties
Ideal for real estate investors building portfolios

products.name: Non-QM Loans
products.description: Alternative documentation mortgage products for brokers and real estate professionals. Designed for borrowers who don't fit traditional QM guidelines.
keyFeatures: One unified guideline set covering all Non-QM nuances

products.name: Bank Statement Loans
products.description: Non-QM loans using bank statements for income qualification instead of tax returns. Perfect for self-employed borrowers.

products.name: Foreign National Loans
products.description: Investment property financing for foreign national borrowers working with real estate professionals.

products.name: Closed End Seconds
products.description: Second lien home equity loans. Standard and Alt Doc options available.

products.name: Prime Time Loans
products.description: Standard and alternative documentation loan products with competitive rates for real estate transactions.

products.name: Short-Term Rental Loans
products.description: Financing for Airbnb and vacation rental investment properties. DSCR-qualified.
keyFeatures: Designed for Airbnb and vacation rentals

products.name: Hybrid Business Purpose Loans
products.description: Business purpose loan products for business owners.

products.name: Investment Property Financing
products.description: Rental property loans for 1-8 unit residential and mixed-use investment properties.

brokerPartnership.applicationProcess: Complete the TQL Broker Application Form available on the Forms page. TQL reviews submissions and contacts qualified applicants within 2-3 business days.
